staff.name: Station Master
staff.role: Manages the station, oversees staff and operations.

staff.name: Conductor
staff.role: Ensures safe passage of passengers and cargo, monitors train performance

staff.name: Ticket Collector
staff.role: Sells tickets to passengers, handles ticket sales and refunds

actions.description: Purchase a ticket from the ticket collector or automated kiosk.
Enter the train through the designated boarding platform.
Leave the station premises through the designated exit gates.
